name: @mentra/sdk
description: Build apps for MentraOS smartglasses. This SDK provides everything you need to create real-time smartglasses applications.

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.build:js-only: bun run clean && bun run build:js
scripts.build:full: bun run clean && bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --sourcemap=external --external @logtail/pino --external axios --external boxen --external chalk --external cookie-parser --external dotenv --external express --external jimp --external jsonwebtoken --external jsrsasign --external multer --external pino --external pino-pretty --external strip-ansi --external ws
scripts.dev: echo 'No build needed in dev mode - using source files directly'
